info.title: De Minimis API
info.description: The De Minimis API provides data about the De Minimis amount and the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount that products may be subject to when exported to foreign countries.  De Minimis is the threshold for a product's value below which no duty or tariff is charged.  Furthermore, products below the De Minimis undergo minimal clearance procedures, such as customs and paperwork requirements.  Similarly, the value of the exported products must exceed the VAT amount before it is subject to VAT.

get.description: The De Minimis API provides data about the De Minimis amount and the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount that products may be subject to when exported to foreign countries.  De Minimis is the threshold for a product's value below which no duty or tax is charged.  Furthermore, products below the De Minimis undergo minimal clearance procedures, such as customs and paperwork requirements.  Similarly, the value of the exported products must exceed the VAT amount before it is subject to VAT.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Returns de minimis rates for a match in the country or notes fields.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns de minimis rates based on ISO alpha-2 country codes.  Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the maximum amount of hits to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch.

de_minimis_value.description: De Minimis value for that country

de_minimis_currency.description: ISO-3 currency code for the country's De Minimis

vat_currency.description: ISO-3 currency code for the country's VAT

notes.description: Notes for each De Minimis and VAT amount
